[[FC Spartak Trnava|Spartak Trnava]] | most wins = Slovan Bratislava (59) | most player appearances = }} '''West-Slovakia Derby''' is the name for the rivalry between two Slovak football teams [[Å K Slovan Bratislava]] and [[FC Spartak Trnava]]. The two teams are among the most successful clubs in [[Slovakia]]. The game is considered the most prestigious match in the Slovakian football calendar. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;font-size:95%" ! width="100" | Matches ! width="100" | [[Å K Slovan Bratislava|Slovan]]
